# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value far exceeds $10000. For a limited time, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you with an offer to purchase the product for $12000. This generous discount is my way of acknowledging your potential to benefit immensely from its use. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with [Product Name]. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
